description: AI-powered agricultural assistant for plant disease detection and remedy recommendation using fuzzy logic and context-aware session memory.

changes: Implemented 'Token Set Ratio' for smarter symptom matching (e.g., 'Red spot' matches 'Brown spot').
Added context memory to handle multi-turn conversations (Plant -> Symptom -> Diagnosis).
Fixed '500 Internal Server Error' by adding automatic table creation on startup.
Integrated 'Save Report' feature to log all diagnoses to the database.
Implemented basic greetings and plant detection logic.
